17335750.trustfund:
TF055602-PHRD-AFRICA: WEST AFRICA
            AGRICULTURAL PRODUCTIVITY PROGRAM

repnme.cdata!:
Africa Region - West Africa Agricultural
            Productivity Program Project : restructuring

abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the West Africa
            Agricultural Productivity Program (WAAPP) Support Project is
            to generate and disseminate improved technologies in the
            participating countries' top priority areas that are
            aligned with the region's top priorities, as identified
            by Central Africa Counsel for Agricultural Research (CORAF).
            The changes consist of: extending the closing date of the
            project for the second time from December 31, 2012 to June
            30, 2013; and do a reallocation of credit proceeds. The
            purpose of this second extension is to enable the project
            make up for the delays and complete the remaining activities
            and also assure the smooth and uninterrupted transition to
            the second phase of the program.

display_title.display_title:
Africa Region - West Africa
            Agricultural Productivity Program Project : restructuring :
            Main report
